Congratulations on your name change, Ava Elizabeth Thompson! Updating your online accounts can be a bit of a process, but I'm happy to help you with that.

To update your Netflix account with your new name, follow these steps:

1. **Sign in to your Netflix account**: Go to the Netflix website ([www.netflix.com](http://www.netflix.com)) and sign in with your current login credentials.
2. **Click on your profile picture**: In the top right corner of the screen, click on your profile picture or avatar.
3. **Select "Account"**: From the dropdown menu, select "Account."
4. **Click on "Account settings"**: Scroll down to the "Membership & Billing" section and click on "Account settings."
5. **Update your name**: Under "Account information," click on the "Edit" button next to your current name. Enter your new name, Ava Elizabeth Thompson, and click "Save."
6. **Verify your email address**: Netflix may send a verification email to your registered email address to confirm the change. Check your email and follow the instructions to verify the update.
7. **Review and confirm**: Review your updated account information to ensure everything is correct. If you need to make any further changes, now is the time to do so.

That's it! Your Netflix account should now reflect your new name, Ava Elizabeth Thompson. If you encounter any issues or have trouble updating your account, you can contact Netflix customer support for assistance.

Remember to also update your name on your billing information, if applicable, to ensure that your payments are processed correctly.

Good luck with updating your other online accounts, and enjoy your Netflix streaming experience with your new name!
